titleStmt.title: The skilful physician containing directions for the preservation of a healthful condition, and approved remedies for all diseases and infirmities (outward or inward) incident to the body of man ... whereunto is added experimented instructions for the compounding of perfumes, also for the chusing and ordering of all kinds of wines, both in preserving the sound, and rectifying those that are prick'd : never before imparted to publick view.
titleStmt.author: Bahia (Brazil : State). Secretaria das Minas e Energia. Diretoria de Distribuição.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Maxey for Nath. Ekins ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
